column1: # Use as many lines of text as you need.
# All text following the "Method:" keyword will be regarded as part of your free text methods description.
The goal of this submission was to have an experimental guess. The idea is that
these estimations would be similar to what a human expert might guess based
on the chemical substructures in a molecule. As I am not personally an expert
in estimating pKa from the structure of a molecule
pKa Prospector to perform a substructure search on each molecule and submitted
an estimate for the macro pKa based on matching the ionizable groups
identified by pKa prospector. The uncertainties specified in pKa prospector are
based on the experimental data for that specific molecule. I have provided an
estimation for the uncertainty based on my intuition about the molecules
found in pKa prospector. In all cases
